And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3569><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, I commend <S%G3908><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the word <S%G3056><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to build you up <S%G2026><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them which are sanctified <S%G37><s%>.
